name: Spring (daraujo92)
description:
Launch the square over the moving obstacles to earn points. What's your highest score?

The smaller the gap the more points you will receive!

CONTOLS:

Press LEFT / A or RIGHT / D to move letf and right respectively.

Jump with SPACE, the longer you keep it pressed, the higher you will jump.

PRO TIP:

If you launch the square while moving, the square will keep the inertia.

Did you find a bug? Please report it (you can use the comments section to do so) and I'll check it out.
